cont.entity_a: The interface board was used to retrieve data from an old disk. Had success retrieving data and getting warranty replacement.
cont.entity_b: Peace of mind for data safety from hard drive failure.

cont.entity_a: The on/off switch is not problematic. Most drives don't have on/off switches. Power button is touch-sensitive and lacks feedback. On/off button is uncomfortable.
The eSATA connection is extremely fast. The eSATA connector is incompatible with 2 out of 3 chipsets. USB interface works well, but eSATA can lock up system. eSATA connection is faster than USB.
cont.entity_b: Transfer speed between external hard drive and computer is fast. Connection on hard drive side is loose.

cont.entity_a: Reliable for moving large amounts of data and backups. Product looks great and is reliable.
cont.entity_b: Quick delivery and no issues after one month of use.

cont.entity_a: The design is interchangeable, allowing use of spare parts. Easy to install, small footprint, attractive design, excellent performance.
cont.entity_b: Light and slender design for easy travel. Compact, portable, and lightweight. Smaller and lighter than expected.

cont.entity_a: Unit turns itself on and off while in use and runs very hot. Base remains hot unless unplugged. Runs very hot compared to WD 500 GB drive. Delayed Write Failure occurs with overheating.
Drive failed to reformat to Mac OS despite claims. Drive performs well with Mac OS X. May not be recognized by computer immediately. Drive may not be recognized by computer.
cont.entity_b: Works with both Vista and Windows XP. Not detected by several computers and PS3. Windows reports write errors, and MacBook cannot read the drive. Software is for Windows, requires reformatting for Linux or Mac.

cont.entity_a: Offers more storage space than a 300 GB drive. Claims 750 GB, but only 650 GB free space. Triples recording capacity of DirecTV DVR. Drive has large storage space and a freeware program.
cont.entity_b: Good for file storage, but too small for newer PC backups. Stores photos, documents, and other files effectively.

cont.entity_a: Drive failed to reformat to Mac OS despite claims. Hard drive crashed after 6 months. Drive failed to pull power from power supply.
cont.entity_b: Failed after years of use, resulting in data loss.
Easy to setup and use. Plug and play functionality.

Bundled backup software had recognition issues. Third-party backup program worked perfectly. Software for portable desktop application is not included. External hard drive cluttered with failed software attempt.

cont.entity_a: Customer service provided $50 credit for issues. Seagate support provided a replacement for a defective drive.

cont.entity_b: Two USB plugs required. Uses two USB ports, beeps if one is unplugged.
Price found lower at Fry's a week later.

cont.entity_a: Very fast and works perfectly with XP. Meets or exceeds advertised statements.
